alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 02 at 9:15PM PST until March 04 at 12:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON THURSDAY TO MIDNIGHT PST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts from 50 to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains, Riverside County Mountains, San Diego County Mountains and San Diego County Deserts. * WHEN...From noon Thursday to midnight PST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains
